post.text: For a start - Crooked Hillary should return the $10M-$25M back to Saudi Arabia, IMMEDIATELY!

comment.author: Nathan
comment.text: PLEASE! And how much money have you donated to the needy except taking money from the poor to benefit yourself. If Hillary is croocked as you suggested then show us your income tax for the last 10 years.

replies.author: Kiley
replies.text: Trump has donated millions upon million over the decades simian.

replies.author: Chacee
replies.text: I'd be happy to, I do a lot of volunteer work as well, and never run into a Liberal volunteer. Statistically, government figures show that prosperous females and Republicans give more money to charity. That is easy to look up.
